title.rendered: AVI Oil supports STEM lab and smart classrooms in Haryana

content.rendered: To provide quality learning opportunities for underserved students and foster interest in science and technology, Smile Foundation collaborated with AVI Oil India Pvt. Ltd. to inaugurate a new STEM lab and Smart Class in the Mission Education Center of Ballabgarh, Faridabad, Haryana. AVI Oil India Pvt. Ltd. has provided continued support towards the Mission Education programme since 2017, helping us reach out to hundreds of children and provide them with better education opportunities.

excerpt.rendered: To provide quality learning opportunities for underserved students and foster interest in science and technology, Smile Foundation collaborated with AVI Oil India Pvt. Ltd. to inaugurate a new STEM lab […]
